name: European Horse Network
goal: a non profit network of stakeholders acting at a European national or regional level within the European Horse sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Animal welfare, animal health, veterinary medecines, responsible ownership, future CAP, Consumers' sales
